sen.j: 韶子内親王（しょうし/あきこないしんのう、延喜18年（918年） - 天元3年1月18日 （980年2月7日））は、平安時代中期の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Princess Shoshi (or Akiko) (918 - February 7, 980) was from the Imperial family living in the mid Heian Period.

sen.j: 醍醐天皇の皇女で、母は承香殿女御源和子（光孝天皇皇女）。
sen.e: She was a princess of Emperor Daigo and her mother was MINAMOTO no Kazuko (or Washi), Jokyoden no nyogo (a princess of Emperor Koko.)

sen.j: 朱雀天皇・村上天皇らの異母姉妹で、同母兄弟に常明親王・式明親王・有明親王・慶子内親王・斉子内親王がいた。
sen.e: She was a half sister of Emperor Suzaku and Emperor Murakami with a different mother, and Imperial Prince Tsuneakira, Imperial Prince Noriakira, Imperial Prince Ariakira, Imperial Princess Keishi (or Yoshiko) and Imperial Princess Seishi (or Tadako, Kiyoko) with the same mother.

sen.j: 延喜20年（920年）12月内親王宣下を受け、同21年2月に父天皇の斎院に卜定された。
sen.e: She was given the title of Imperial Princess in December 920, and appointed as Saiin for the Emperor, her father, in February 921.

sen.j: 延長2年（924年）裳着を行い二品に叙された。
sen.e: She went through Mogi (ceremony for girls on reaching womanhood) and was conferred Nihon (the second court rank for Imperial Princes) in 924.

sen.j: のち大納言源清蔭（陽成天皇皇子）に嫁ぎ、のち河内国守橘惟風と再婚した。
sen.e: Afterward, she got married with Dainagon (Major Counselor) MINAMOTO no Kiyokage (a son of Emperor Yozei), and got married with TACHIBANA no Korekaze, Kawachi no kuni no kami (Governor of Kawachi Province) again in a later year.
